name: What is in the can?
description:
Made for the 5th Klagenfurt Winter Game Jam

I did not have much motivation for this jam, so it was cobbled together in just a few hours.

Topic: What's in the can?

Diversifiers: Limited color palette, There's no one left

Heavily inspired by http://shimage.net/one-tap-quest/

Code: https://git.tchncs.de/murks/what-is-in-the-box

Instructions: click
